20101201200807.000|20101201200808.667|CCO|CERTAIN PARTS THAT ARE IN THE 
20101201200808.667|20101201200810.333|CCO|GEOGRAPHIC AREA.
20101201200810.333|20101201200812.000|CCO|ONLY CERTAIN PARTS OF MANHATTAN,
20101201200812.000|20101201200813.667|CCO|FOR EXAMPLE.
